analysis.description:
PlayerBook.registerNameCore (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#342-374) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- adminAddress.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#362-364)
NameFilter.nameFilter (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#571-646) is declared view but contains assembly code
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddr (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#208) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXnameFromDapp (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#526) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXname (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#249) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddrFromDapp (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#488) is a local variable never initialiazed

PlayerBook.addMeToGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[_gameID].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#295-297)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_laff) (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#313-314)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#316-319)

PlayerBook.registerNameCore has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_affID) (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#367)

NameFilter.nameFilter uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#571-646)
	- /unique_contracts/0xa50a1d26f7f9fbf24ef1a41b2870e317f9c4bc93.sol#643-646
